front.gametext: Once per turn, may place your non-droid character just lost at same or related site in Used Pile instead of Lost Pile. X on Bacta Tank is -2.
front.lore: Made by Genetech. Unusually independent for a droid. Forced to serve a Moff on Firro, but was liberated by Tiree. Now dedicated to serving the Alliance.
front.title: •2-1B (Too-Onebee) (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Non-lightsaber weapons carried by your non-Jedi characters may not be stolen. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site you control with a non-[Permanent Weapon] blaster present. Rebel Artillery is a Lost interrupt. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'I've been looking forward to this for a long time.' 'Yes, I'll bet you have.' Han abruptly ended his conversation with Greedo and flipped Wuher a credit to pay for the cleanup.
front.title: •A Good Blaster At Your Side

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, if you just deployed a combat vehicle, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force and reveal one [Clone Army] vehicle from hand to take into hand a clone pilot of ability < 3 (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle and deploy both simultaneously. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •A Grand Army Of The Republic

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  While Sidious or an [Episode I] hologram on table, opponent may not cancel immunity to attrition of your Jedi and draws no more than two battle destiny at sites where you have a Jedi.  Opponent draws no more than two battle destiny where Luke present. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke's sudden reversal of fortune allowed him to turn the tables on Vader.
front.title: •A Jedi's Cunning

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Tom Plis - Chicago V-Lite 2006)

front.gametext: USED: If a captive on table, activate 2 Force.  LOST: Once per game, if a Dark Jedi present with a Skywalker (except Shmi), even as a non-frozen captive, they duel. Both players draw 2 destiny; add ability. Higher total wins. For remainder of turn, winner is immune to attrition and the loser may not move.
front.lore: Early on in his duel with Vader, Luke took his time in trying to sense his opponent's weaknesses.
front.title: •A Jedi's Patience (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on a site.  Nightfall is canceled.  While you have 8 or fewer cards in hand, non-unique characters (except clones), vehicles, starships, weapons, and devices are immune to Monnok.  Once per turn, may use 2 Force to deploy Jedi Archives or a battleground planet location (except sector) not on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The guidance of experienced Jedi allowed Luke to confront Vader.
front.title: •A Jedi's Plans

front.gametext: Deploy on The Hyperdrive Generator's Gone: treat '4' on it as '2'. Your Force generation at City Outskirts is +1. May deploy systems regardless of your Objective deployment restrictions. Once per game, may deploy Qui-Gon or Obi-Wan (an/or their matching weapon_ from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: In unfamiliar and potentially hostile territory, Qui-Gon knew that success would require patience and caution.
front.title: •A Remote Planet (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Whenever you verify opponent's Reserve Deck, may place a card there with 'podracer' in game text out of play or retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: 'Stand By...'
front.title: •A Tremor In The Force (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on your Rebel scout. During battles at same site, attrition against opponent is +1. May target a character, creature or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. Once during your control phase, may fire using 2 Force.
front.lore: BlasTech sharpshooter rifle accurate to 500 meters. Corporal Janse brought several A280s with him when he left BlasTech.
front.title: ••A280 Sharpshooter Rifle (V)

front.gametext: Power +1 for each of opponent's characters here. When with two of your aliens (or clones), adds one battle destiny. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other aliens (and clones) present are each 'hit.' Immune to You are Beaten and attrition <5.
front.lore: Female Twi'lek.
front.title: •Aayla Secura

front.gametext: Deploy on table. At Cloud City sites, Stunning Leader may not be played and your non-[Permanent Weapon] Rebels of ability > 3 are immune to attrition < 4. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The doors on Cloud City use a special computer controlled locking system, making them difficult to bypass without altering the security codes.
front.title: Access Denied (V)

front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, and 4 vehicles. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Adds 1 to attrition against opponent here for each piloted [Republic] starship present. Concussions Missiles may deploy aboard.
front.lore: blank
front.title: Acclamator-Class Assault Ship

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. It's a Trap! is destiny +2. Adds one battle destiny while piloting a Mon Calamari Star Cruiser. Once per game, may deploy a capital starship to a system (even as a 'react') from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Mon Calamari leader of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.
front.title: •Admiral Ackbar (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel Uncertain Is The Future  STARTING: If Massassi Base Operations on table, deploy from Reserve Deck Death Star Schematics, Massassi War Room, and up to two Effects that deploy for free and are [Immune to Alter].  Place this Interrupt in hand.
front.lore: Early warning and careful planning allow the Rebels to achieve maximum readiness while still maintaining optimal flexibility.
front.title: Advance Preparation (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on your battleground. Once per battle, if opponent's card is hit by a non-[Permanent Weapon] weapon, may make opponent's total power -4 (-2 if hit by a lightsaber).
front.lore: With only a few Jedi remaining in the galaxy, each confrontation between them has far reaching consequences.
front.title: •Advantage (V)

front.gametext: Plays on table. Unless Inner Strength on table, opponent may use only one combat card per turn. While opponent has 2 Dark Jedi on Naboo, you lose no more than 2 Force to Force drains at opponent's Naboo sites. Let Them Make The First Move may target only droids and spies.
front.lore: 'What was that?' The Jedi power known as 'affect mind' is often used to create minor distractions, allowing Jedi to elude enemies rather than engage them in battle.
front.title: •Affect Mind (V)

front.gametext: Light:  May not be deployed if an Alderaan site (or sector) on table. Star Cruisers ignore location deployment restrictions in their game text.  Dark:  When deployed, you choose: flip Set Your Course For Alderaan immediately or at the end of your next turn.
front.title: •Alderaan (Blown Away)

front.gametext: May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Opponent must use +2 Force to initiate a battle here. Once per game, may deploy a senator aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.title: Alderaan Consular Ship

front.gametext: Deploy on Table. If Independent Operation on table, and all your ability is provided by Leia, Luke, aliens, Cloud Cars, and [Independent] starship pilots: Cloud City Troopers ignore location deployment restrictions (and 'power -1') in their game text; immunity to attrition of opponent's characters and starships at Bespin locations is limited to < 6; your total battle destiny is +1 (+2 if your trooper in battle); and you retrieve 2 Force whenever you initiate battle. Place on Bottom of Force Pile if canceled.
front.title: •All My Urchins & •Cloud City Celebration

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, if all your ability on table is provided by Cloud Cars, Han (except Han, Chewie, And The Falcon), and aliens, may place your just forfeited card in Used Pile.
front.lore: One little, two little, three little Bespinites.
front.title: •All My Urchins (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
front.lore: The Force can be used to affect the things around a Jedi. 'Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
front.title: Alter (Coruscant) (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'
front.title: Alter (Premiere) (V)

front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy up to two clones from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If your clones occupy three related battlegrounds during your control phase, use 2 Force (free if on Coruscant) to retrieve any one card into hand. OR If your clone in battle, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: 'Well done. Hold them in the security tower, and keep it quiet. Move.'
front.title: •Ambush (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on Jedi Council Chamber or Yoda's Hut.  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to take a card with 'A Jedi's' in title (except A Jedi's Resilience) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  [Virtual Block 5] Wipe Them Out, All Of Them and opponent's [Sidious] Effects here are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The peacekeepers of the galaxy are not to be taken lightly.
front.title: •An Unusual Amount Of Fear (V)

front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Azure Angel. Adds 2 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Players may initiate battles here for free. During battle, your battle destiny draws and Anakin's weapon destiny draws are +1. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.
front.title: •Anakin Skywalker, Padawan Learner

front.gametext: Power +2 while armed with a lightsaber. May use any 'stolen' lightsaber. Once during battle, where present, may steal an opponent's just-lost lightsaber. Immune to attrition <3 (<5 while armed with a 'stolen' lightsaber).
front.lore: Padawan.
front.title: •Anakin Solo

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Peter Nordstrom - Alderaan Regional 2005)

front.gametext: Deploy on Leia, non-Jedi Luke, or any Mara. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value. Instead of firing, may use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny here.
front.lore: Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.
front.title: •Anakin's Lightsaber (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table with up to 15 cards from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Uncertain Is The Future until the end of your first turn.
front.lore: 'The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight.'
front.title: •Anger, Fear, Aggression (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel Lateral Damage (Immune to Sense.) OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) aboard your starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle  LOST: Once per game, if opponent has more cards with ability on table than you, draw destiny and retrieve up to that number of Rebels and/or Rebel starships (may take one retrieved card into hand).
front.title: •Antilles Maneuver & •Rebel Reinforcements

front.gametext: For remainder of turn, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon and opponent's starship weapon destiny draws are -1. OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) from Reserve Deck aboard your starship; reshuffle.
front.lore: As their war with the Empire continued, Rebel pilots learned ways to counter standard Imperial tactics such as the Tallon Roll.
front.title: •Antilles Maneuver (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel Disarmed or Stunning Leader.  OR  If a battle was just initiated, deploy a character weapon on your participating character from Reserve Deck (or hand); reshuffle.  LOST: Use 1 Force to deploy (or retrieve) non-[Reflections 3] Obi-Wan from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  OR  If opponent just initiated a battle against non-[Reflections 3] Obi-Wan alone at a site, his forfeit cannot be reduced.
front.title: •Armed And Dangerous & •Krayt Dragon Howl

front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. Your artillery weapons at same and related sites are Heroic and may be targeted by weapons like a vehicle (use armor = 4). May place this device in Used Pile to add 2 to a just drawn artillery weapon destiny.
front.lore: Although artillery weapons have a manual firing mechanism, this optional device allows weapons operation from a remote location. Uses coded signals.
front.title: Artillery Remote (V)

front.gametext: When deployed, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Unless hit, may re-target a weapon targeting Chewie, Leia, or Luke (of ability < 5) to this droid (targeting may not be canceled). If this droid was just forfeited during opponent's turn, may take it into hand.
front.lore: Threepio's extensive experience 'talking' to the Falcon's computer allowed him to pilot the freighter while on Coruscant. Artoo, an R-unit droid, provided moral support.
front.title: •Artoo & •Threepio (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jared Lockwood - Origins V-Lite 2005)

front.gametext: Heroic. Death Star Plans ignores objective game text, but only draws one destiny. Leia may not move (or be carried) the turn she is released. Once per game, may deploy Trash Compactor from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May not be Undercover, 'choked,' or targeted by Emperor.
front.lore: Counterpart to C-3PO. Spy. Obstinate, headstrong and always full of surprises. R2-D2 was an integral part of Luke Skywalker's rescue plans.
front.title: •Artoo (V)

front.gametext: May fly (landspeed = 2). Once per game, may target up to two opponent's droids present; owner must place targets in Used Pile or lose 4 Force. While aboard an [Episode I] starship, it is power +3 and immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity).
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.
front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid (V)

front.gametext: May fly (landspeed = 2). Once per game, may target up to two opponent's droids present; owner must place targets in Used Pile or lose 4 Force. While aboard an [Episode I] starship, it is power +3 and immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity).
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.
front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid (V) (AI)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Pat Johnson - Corellia Regionals 2005)

front.gametext: USED: If opponent occupies your site, peek at the top two cards of Reserve Deck and take one into hand.  LOST: During any move phase, lose 2 Force to relocate up to 3 of your characters from an interior Theed Palace site to any related Throne Room (or vice versa).
front.lore: Modified S-5 security blasters can be used for a wide array of purposes
front.title: •Ascension Guns (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Asteroid Sanctuary is canceled. When you complete Rycar's Run, place it out of play. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each Asteroid Field you control (limit 3). During your deploy phase, may deploy one Rycar's Run or asteroid sector on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The personal fears of Vader's minions do not affect his priorities.
front.title: •Asteroids Do Not Concern Me (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on Yoda's Hut.  May use 1 Force to prevent Broken concentration from modifying your training destiny (and Strong Is Vader from retrieving Force) this turn.  If Luke has completed Jedi Test #5 and is about to be hit, may place this Effect out of play to prevent it.
front.lore: To recover from the strenuous Jedi training routine and revitalize the mind and body, an apprentice must rest to be calm and at peace.
front.title: •At Peace (V)

front.gametext: May add 1 pilot (suspends permanent pilot). May move as a 'react.' Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Dual Laser Cannon may deploy aboard. When deployed, may Dual Laser Cannon aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.title: AT-RT

front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 4 passengers. While piloted by a clone, draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead 'hit'. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Enclosed
front.title: •••AT-TE

front.gametext: During a battle at a site, if you are about to draw a card for battle destiny, you may instead use the maneuver number of your participating combat vehicle.
front.lore: Snowspeeder attack plan devised by Commander Skywalker and Rebel tactician Beryl Chifonage. Single-file formation protects the squadron as the leader draws fire.
front.title: Attack Pattern Delta (V)

front.gametext: During your control phase, if No Love For The Empire on table, may retrieve a non-unique alien of a different species than your Rep.
front.lore: From a mysterious species known as Hoovers. Possesses tremendous technical abilities. Small size allows him to easy manipulate detailed electronic equipment.
front.title: •Attark (V)

front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. Adds one battle destiny with Kalit. Your Jawas and sandcrawlers are destiny +2. May deploy Jawa Camp, Sergeant Doallyn, or Thedit on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Shaman of her Jawa tribe. Mate of Kalit. Suspects betrayal from her mate's rival, Wittin.
front.title: •Aved Luun (V)

front.gametext: USED: An opponent's just drawn [Permanent Weapon] weapon destiny is -3. (Immune to Sense.)  LOST: Once per game, retrieve up to 5 weapons (may take one retireved card into hand).
front.lore: 'I mean you no harm.'
front.title: •Away Put Your Weapon (V)

front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 1 astromech. Once per game, may deploy an astromech aboard (for free) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While Anakin piloting, your Interrupts targeting this starship may not be canceled and immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •Azure Angel

front.gametext: If Center of Tyranny on Table, deploy on table. Insurrection is lost. Rogue Squadron pilots of ability < 3 are forfeit +1 and if lost from table, may be placed here. During your control phase may use 2 force to take a character here into hand. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Medical wonder invented centuries ago by the Vratix insectoid species. Gelatinous red bacta is suspended in a synthetic solution to create a healing bacterial medium.
front.title: •Bacta Infirmary

front.gametext: Agenda: rebellion. Adds one battle destiny with Leia. Your [Coruscant] senators and [Coruscant] Political Effects are lost. While at Senate: unique (•) Rebels of ability < 4 are power +2, and, if opponent just lost Force to a Force drain by a Rebel, may retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Leader. Senator.
front.title: •Bail Organa

front.gametext: Agenda: rebellion. Your [Coruscant] Political Effects and [Coruscant] senators are lost. Whenever you initiate a battle with a Rebel, may retrieve 1 Force. While in a senate majority, during your control phase, may take one card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Senator. Leader.
front.title: •Bail Organa, Father Of Rebellion

front.gametext: If your corvette, cruiser, and frigate are in battle together, cancel an opponent's non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt. OR Deploy a frigate (deploys -2) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and cruiser; reshuffle. OR Deploy a cruiser (deploys -3) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and frigate; reshuffle.
front.lore: Alliance starfighter pilots cross-train with other starship types to maximize combat efficiency.
front.title: •Balanced Attack (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Corey Faherty - Nationals 2006)

front.gametext: This character is lost if a Starting Effect on table. Your non-alien characters at sites are power and forfeit = 0. If present at a battleground site, your Force drains at battleground sites where you have two aliens are +1, and whenever you deploy an alien, retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Hunchbacked scavengers. Found in separate groups throughout the galaxy. Good at finding missing items. Make excellent gun runners. Some work with the rebellion.
front.title: •••Baragwin (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Your unique (•) aliens are forfeit +1 (+2 if they have printed deploy costs greater than or equal to their printed forfeit).  During your deploy phase, may deploy one Attark, Crell, Loje, Momaw, Tzizvvt, or Vul from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The alcoves of Jabba's palace are good places to make deals and place bets. Jabba gets a cut of the profits, of course.
front.title: •Bargaining Table (V)

front.gametext: Landspeed = 2.  During battle, for each non-parasite creature here (even if excluded), power +2 (+4 if ferocious).  If an opponent's card here is eaten, you may retrieve up to 4 Force.  Once per turn, may deploy Kaadu here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Cannot be attacked.
front.lore: Female.
front.title: •••Beast Rider

front.gametext: If Republic At War on table, deploy on table. Foward Command Center gain one [Light Side Icon]. Your force generatation is +1 at each battleground you control with a [Clone Army] card. Your clones gain [Clone Army]. Once per turn may take a [Clone Army] mission into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter)
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •Begun, The Clone War Has

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Independent Starship] starships are defense value +2 at Bespin locations. Once per game, if Quiet Mining Colony on table, may simultaneously deploy a unique (•) [Independent Starship] starfighter and matching pilot (for -1 Force each) from your hand and/or Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Symbol for the Cloud City Miner's Guild (not affiliated with the Galactic Miner's Guild). Named after the beldons, giant creatures who generate Tibanna gas.
front.title: •Beldon's Eye (V)

front.gametext: Once per turn, if present at a farm and a destiny was just drawn that is within 1 of the destiny of your 'crop,' may use 1 Force to place 'crop' in Used Pile. Whenever you play Beru Stew or Blue Milk, may draw top card from your Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Wife of Owen Lars and guardian of Luke Skywalker. Quietly lobbied Owen to allow Luke to attend Academy. Maintains Lars' farm hydroponics labs.
front.title: •Beru Lars (V)

front.gametext: USED: Activate 1 Force (2 if a Lars on table). OR During battle at a farm, add the destiny number of your device on this farm to your total power.  LOST: During battle at a farm, after battle destinies are drawn, place a 'crop' out of play to make attrition against you = 0.
front.lore: Moisture farmers grow enough food to sustain Tatooine's population. Beru Lars has devised many dishes using herbs and roots naturally found in Tatooine's desert.
front.title: •Beru Stew (V)

front.gametext: Your dejariks are destiny +2. Grimtaash is immune to Sense. Once per turn, may take Grimtaash into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Roche J9 worker drone. Undefeated hologame player. Kept by Jabba as a source of entertainment. Hoping for escape or termination.
front.title: •BG-J38 (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys free to Beggar's Canyon, Red 3, or same location as Fel or Hobbie. While piloting Red 3, it has an [Nav Computer] aboard. During your control phase, may take one Old Times into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards on Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.
front.title: •Biggs Darklighter (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots, 3 on Red 3.  While piloting Red 3, it is maneuver +1 and he draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.  If at opponent's system, instead of Force draining here, may take any card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards at Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.
front.title: •Biggs, Rogue Legend

front.gametext: Deploy on Kyle Katarn or your smuggler. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if destiny +2 > defense value. If fired by Kyle Katarn, his immunity to attrition is +1 for remainder of turn.
front.lore: llegal weapon easily purchased by Rebel suppliers on the black market. Rechargeable energy packs make it a cost-effective weapon.
front.title: •Black Market Blaster

front.gametext: Deploy on your Republic warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Standard issue for Imperial forces. So numerous that many have been stolen by Rebels. Extendable stock. Carries energy for 100 shots.
front.title: Blaster Rifle (V)

front.gametext: Light:  If you occupy during your control phase, may release an imprisoned captive here. Immune to revolution.  Dark:  While Palpatine imprisoned here, opponent's Force drains everywhere are -1.
front.title: •Blockade Flagship: Prison

front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers.  Permanent pilot is •Booster, who provides ability of 3.  Once per game, may deploy Mirax here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Immune to Lateral Damage and attrition < 5.
front.lore: Owned by legendary Terrik family of smugglers. Used to chase down the pirates who killed Wedge's parents. On Corellian Security's most wanted list. 37.5 meters long.
front.title: •Booster In Pulsar Skate

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Starships here with a Rogue Squadron pilot aboard may move as a 'react.' Star Destroyers he pilots are hyperspeed + 2. Unless Corellia on table, once per game, may steal an Imperial-class Star Destroyer from opponent's Lost Pile into hand.
front.lore: Corellian, Information broker.
front.title: •Booster Terrik

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 to Cantina, a docking bay, or a starship. BoShek is a matching pilot for any starship. Twice per game, may take a device into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Rogue pilot. Outlaw starship tech. Has secret lab in Mos Eisley. He bragged about beating Han Solo's Kessel Run record. Left fringe life behind after meeting Obi-Wan Kenobi.
front.title: •BoShek (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Aaron Nelson - West Nationals 2008)

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting a freighter at a battleground system, adds 1 to attrition against opponent here and their starships here may not 'cloak.' Opponent loses no more than 3 Force to your Force drains at same system.
front.lore: Rogue pilot. Outlaw starship tech. Has secret lab in Mos Eisley. He bragged about beating Han Solo's Kessel Run record. Left fringe life behind after meeting Obi-Wan Kenobi.
front.title: •BoShek, Brash Smuggler

front.gametext: May deploy as an Undercover spy to Coruscant, Tatooine, or same site as a gangster. Power +2 while alone or with a scoundrel. During battle, may peek at top card of a Reserve Deck; may place that card under that deck. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Leia obtained the armor of a notorious mercenary to sneak onto Coruscant. She later assumed the same role to spy on Jabba. Fearless and inventive. Jabba's kind of scum.
front.title: •Boushh (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on your Wookiee. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny (may take drawn card into hand). Target hit if destiny + X > defense value, where X = number of Kashyyyk sites you control.
front.lore: Hand-crafted weapon of choice among Wookiees. Fires explosive 'quarrels' (which look like blaster bolts). Requires great strength to use. Extra ammo carried on bandoleers.
front.title: Bowcaster (V)

front.gametext: X = Light Side cards in hand. Y = Dark Side cards in hand. If X < Y, your Force generation is +1. If X = Y, adds one battle destiny. Once per turn, if X > Y, may lose a card from hand to make a just drawn weapon or battle destiny = pi.
front.lore: BoShek nicknamed this male Siniteen 'Brainiac' due to his ability to calculate hyperspace coordinates in his head. 'He's the brains, sweetheart!'
front.title: •Brainiac (V)

front.gametext: May add one astromech. During battle, may target a starship with no character piloting. Draw destiny. If destiny > defense value, target hit. Permanent pilot provides ability of 4. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Flown by an unknown pilot who likes to spin a lot. Played the deciding role in the attack against the Droid Control Ship.
front.title: •Bravo Fighter (V)

front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During battle, if with a Rebel capital starship, may use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn battle destiny.
front.lore: Modified medium transport. Well armored. Has expanded passenger capacity to facilitate evacuation. The last transport to escape Hoth. Nearly destroyed by the Stalker.
front.title: •Bright Hope (V)

front.gametext: Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. While present at opponent's non-docking bay site, cancels its Dark Side game text. Blaster Rifle is a matching weapon for Bron.
front.lore: Ugly scars cover this former commando from southern Nentan. Likes to be on his own. Crack shot. Off and on partner of Debnoli. Relies on intuition to survive.
front.title: •Bron Burs (V)

front.gametext: During a battle at a site with R2-D2, may not be targeted by weapons, and may draw one destiny; subtract that amount from opponent's total power. Once per game, may place all your non-Immune to Alter Effects on table in Used Pile.
front.lore: Cybot Galactica 3PO human-cyborg relations droid. Fluent in over six million forms of communication. 112 years old. Has never been memorywiped... as far as he knows.
front.title: •C-3PO (See-Threepio) (V)

front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated at an interior site where both players have a participating character armed with a weapon, your weapon destiny draws there are +1 (+3 if at Cantina) for remainder of turn.
front.lore: '...watch your step. This place can be a little rough.' The Mos Eisley Cantina harbors smugglers, thieves, cutthroats, criminals and bounty hunters!
front.title: Cantina Brawl (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots, 3: any corvette. While piloting a corvette it is immune to attrition <5 and, once per turn, may peek at a card in opponent's hand. Once per game, during battle (unless Vader here) may use 2 force to move ship away (for free).
front.title: •Captain Antilles

front.gametext: Your clones deploy -1 here. While at an [Episode I] battleground site, adds one battle destiny. Permanent weapon is •Twin Blasters (may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit and forfeit -3 if total destiny -2 > defense value).
front.lore: Leader. Clone trooper.
front.title: •Captain Rex, 501st Legion

front.gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. While aboard your starship, adds 1 to its total weapon destiny. Whenever you hit a starship here, opponent loses 1 Force. During battle, may lose 1 Force to cancel [Coruscant] Watch Your Back!.
front.lore: Mon Calamari computer technician. Expert in power systems. His skills are desperately needed by Rebel fleet. Gunner.
front.title: •Captain Verrack (V)

front.gametext: Artillery weapons here are 'powered.'  Permanent weapon is Blaster Cannon (may target a character, creature, or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free; draw destiny; target 'hit,' and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
front.lore: Scout.
front.title: •Captain Yutani With Blaster Cannon

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Kevin Brownell - Illinois States 2004)

front.gametext: If your starting location was a system, deploy from Reserve Deck a related site (must be a battleground if the system is a non-battleground or Endor) with < 3 [Light Side Force] icons and up to three Effects that are always [Immune to Alter].  Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: Alliance troops on planet must plan ahead to achieve success in military operations.
front.title: •Careful Planning (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may deploy spy R2-D2 (for free) on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During your control phase, if R2-D2 is with captive Leia, may use 1 Force to release her. While Sometimes I Amaze Even Myself on table, where Leia present, ignore Battle Order. May not be canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?'
front.title: •Cell 2187 (V)

back.gametext: Center Of Tyranny:Deploy [Virtual Block 7] Coruscant, Main Power Plant, Lower Levels, Planetary Shield and Rogue Insertion.{For} remainder of Game, Rogue Squadron pilots are Insurgents and may fire blasters for free. Your destiny draws for [Virtual Block 1] Sabatoge are -1 and may not be further reduced. Your characters of ability > 4 are deploy +4.{While} this side up, during your deploy phase may use 1 Force to deploy a Coruscant battleground site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.{Flip} this card if Planetary Shields 'disabled'A Liberated World:{Immediately} retrieve into hand (or take from Reserve Deck any one card; reshuffle).{While} this side up, '1' on Declaration of Rebellion is treated as '2'. Your Force Generation at Coruscant System is +2. While you occupy a system, your force drains are +1 for each related battleground site you control with a Rogue Squadron Pilot. Once per turn, if opponent just lost a starship from a system, you may lose 1 Force to steal it into hand. Once during your turn, if you just forfeited a Rogue Squadron pilot, may use 1 Force to take into hand from Reserve Deck any one card.; reshuffle
back.title: Center Of Tyranny / A Liberated World

front.gametext: Center Of Tyranny:Deploy [Virtual Block 7] Coruscant, Main Power Plant, Lower Levels, Planetary Shield and Rogue Insertion.{For} remainder of Game, Rogue Squadron pilots are Insurgents and may fire blasters for free. Your destiny draws for [Virtual Block 1] Sabatoge are -1 and may not be further reduced. Your characters of ability > 4 are deploy +4.{While} this side up, during your deploy phase may use 1 Force to deploy a Coruscant battleground site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.{Flip} this card if Planetary Shields 'disabled'A Liberated World:{Immediately} retrieve into hand (or take from Reserve Deck any one card; reshuffle).{While} this side up, '1' on Declaration of Rebellion is treated as '2'. Your Force Generation at Coruscant System is +2. While you occupy a system, your force drains are +1 for each related battleground site you control with a Rogue Squadron Pilot. Once per turn, if opponent just lost a starship from a system, you may lose 1 Force to steal it into hand. Once during your turn, if you just forfeited a Rogue Squadron pilot, may use 1 Force to take into hand from Reserve Deck any one card.; reshuffle
front.title: Center Of Tyranny / A Liberated World

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Evan Fitzgerald - PC Volunteer Award 2005)

front.gametext: If a player is about to draw destiny for an Epic Event, Interrupt, Objective, or weapon, that player must first activate 1 Force and shuffle their Reserve Deck. OR If both players just drew one battle destiny, cancel and redraw both destiny draws.
front.lore: Qui-Gon used his Jedi abilities to insure that there was no 'chance' involved with the use of Watto's chance cube.
front.title: •Changing The Odds (V)

front.gametext: Plays on table.  Substituted battle destinies do not count against battle destiny limits.  If all your battle destinies were canceled (and not redrawn) use 1 for your total battle destiny instead.  Once per game, may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.
front.lore: At Cloud City, Luke came face to face with his own destiny. Looking into the abyss, he made his decision.
front.title: Chasm (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  During your turn, may use 1 Force to take one Chewie's AT-ST, Chewbacca's Bowcaster, That's One, or an Interrupt with 'Chewie' or 'Wookiee' in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Wookiee smuggler from Kashyyyk. Over 200 years old. Top-notch mechanic and pilot. Jabba has large bounty on this 'walking carpet'. Friends call him Chewie...or Fuzzball.
front.title: •Chewbacca (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  Deploys -2 to Kashyyyk.  Wookiees are destiny +1 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny.  While stacked on Grrrghrrrgh!, Wookiees are power and forfeit +1.  While hit, Chewie's power is doubled.
front.lore: Wookiee scout. Volunteered for Han's Endor strike team. Keeps his distance, but doesn't look like he's keeping his distance. Always thinks with his stomach.
front.title: •Chewbacca Of Kashyyyk (V)

front.gametext: Deploys free to Coruscant and is a spy while there. During your deploy phase, may deploy one Boushh or Vibro-Ax (on Chewie) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While with Leia, her game text may not be canceled and, once per turn, may take the bottom card of Force Pile into hand.
front.lore: Chewie honored his life debt to Han by protecting Leia. Posed as the mercenary Snoova while on Coruscant. Smuggler. Wookiee.
front.title: •Chewbacca, Protector (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Adds 2 to maneuver of any starfighter he pilots. Your total ability here may not be reduced. Once per game, may lose 1 force to deploy a droid from Lost Pile. During battle, target a just hit character. Target's forfeit is restored to normal.
front.lore: Some people think that hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side. Wookiee scoundrel.
front.title: •Chewbacca, Walking Carpet

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting Falcon, it is maneuver +2, Chewie draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise, and your battle destiny draws (and total battle destiny) at same system may not be modified, canceled, or reset by opponent.
front.lore: Loyal Wookiee companion of Captain Han Solo. Co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon. Leia referred to him as a 'walking carpet'.
front.title: •Chewie (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While present at a site with Han or Leia, Chewie is Heroic and, unless hit, may be forfeited to satisfy all remaining attrition and battle damage against you. Once per game, may take Kashyyyk or Falcon into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Smuggler. Very few people need to be told that angry Wookiees should be given a wide berth.
front.title: •Chewie, Enraged (V)

front.gametext: May add 2 pilots. During battle, if Chewie aboard, may target an opponent's character or AT-ST present. Draw destiny. Target hit and power = 0 if destiny > defense value. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Enclosed Chewie's daring capture of an Imperial AT-ST helped turn the tide in the Battle of Endor.
front.title: •Chewie's AT-ST (V)

front.gametext: Deploys only on Endor. Ewoks on Endor are power +1. 'Vehicle with armor' on Ewok Catapult may be treated as 'non-Dark Jedi character' ('crashes' is then treated as 'lost'). May not be targeted by weapons.
front.lore: Leader of Wicket's Ewok tribe for 42 seasons. Head of the Council of Elders. Decided to spare Han's Rebels and join their fight against the Empire.
front.title: •Chief Chirpa (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. You may not play Rebel Barrier. Senators are deploy +2. Whenever you initiate a battle, may retrieve your topmost non-[Permanent Weapon], non-[Maintenance] character. May place the top card of your Reserve Deck in Lost Pile to place a combat card in owner's Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Attention. This is Lando Calrissian. The Empire has taken control of the city. I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.'
front.title: •Civil Disorder (V)

front.gametext: USED: During opponent's deploy phase, if both players occupy the same battleground, activate 2 Force. LOST: During any deploy phase, deploy a lightsaber from Lost Pile on your character at an interior Naboo battleground.
front.lore: There are some times, more than others, when you should not look down.
front.title: •Clinging To The Edge (V)

front.gametext: Adds one battle destiny if with another clone. During battle, if you are about to draw a battle destiny, may draw two and choose one.
front.lore: Clone trooper.
front.title: ••Clone Infantry Squad

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting a [Republic] starship at a battleground, forfeit +1 and your Force drains are +1 here. Anything he pilots is maneuver +1 and immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 if all your pilot characters here are clones and/or Jedi).
front.title: Clone Pilot

front.gametext: When deployed, may deploy A280 Sharpshooter Rifle on him from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. A280 Sharpsooter Rifle may deploy on Clone Sniper. When firing a rifle at an adjacent site, may draw two weapon destiny and choose one. Immune to Undercover.
front.lore: Clone trooper and scout.
front.title: •••Clone Sniper

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. While piloting a [Clone Army] starship or vehicle, adds 1 to its defense value and he is forfeit +2. Once per battle, when starship or vehicle he is piloting fires a weapon, may draw two weapon destiny and choose one.
front.lore: Clone trooper.
front.title: Clone Specialist

front.gametext: While with Palpatine, Heroic.  Power and forfeit +1 on Coruscant. While [Virtual Block 5] They Will Be Lost And Confused on table, Palpatine is immune to attrition < 6 and your Force drains at same site are +1.
front.title: Clone Trooper

front.gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on table. During your control phase, may use 2 Force to stack a clone from your Lost Pile here face down. At the start of your turn, turn all cards here face up. You may deploy any face up card stacked here (as if from hand). (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •Cloning Cylinders

front.gametext: Deploy on your alien. When fired in battle, your total power is +1. May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. If carried by Lobot or a trooper, '1' on this card is treated as '2'.
front.lore: Black market ties make it possible for the Cloud City quartermaster to acquire powerful weapons such as this. Low refraction index provides minimal beam dispersion.
front.title: Cloud City Blaster (V)

front.gametext: While Massassi Base Operations on table, opponent may deploy only one Imperial to each Yavin 4 site per turn. Doubles Rebel Tech bonus to Attack Run. Once per turn, may take Balanced Attack or a commander into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: One of General Dodonna's chief strategic advisors. Planned the Rebel fleet's approach to the Death Star.
front.title: •Colonel Feyn Gospic (V)

front.gametext: Unique (•) starfighters are immunity to attrition +2 for each non-unique starship of their class present with them. Unique (•) capital starships are defense value +1 for each non-unique starship present at same system. For each of your unique (•)/non-unique starship pairs of the same class present at same system, your battle destiny draws there (and at related sites) are +1.
front.title: •Combined Fleet Action (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Adar is a matching pilot for any unique (•) [Republic] starfighter and, while piloting one, adds one battle destiny. Your [Republic] starfighters here are power and maneuver +1 and may add ability of pilot to total when targeted by Tallon Roll.
front.lore: Leader
front.title: •Commander Adar Tallon

front.gametext: Deploys -1 to same site as Obi-Wan. [Separatist] cards are power and defense value -1 here. When in battle at a site with Rex (or two of your clones), may cancel one just drawn battle destiny.
front.lore: Leader. Clone trooper.
front.title: •Commander Cody

front.gametext: While at your War Room, forfeit +3. Your starships with hyperspeed have a [Nav Computer]. Your piloted starships are forfeit +1.
front.lore: Popular leader whose expertise in space defense and orbital battle stations enabled the Alliance to uncover a fatal flaw in the Death Star's design.
front.title: •Commander Evram Lajaie (V)

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting Rogue 1, it is maneuver +2 and Luke draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise.  During your control phase, may use 1 Force to take a speeder or a card with 'T-47' in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Hero of Yavin. Promoted to Commander in his third year of military training with the Alliance. Squadron flight leader at Echo Base during the Battle of Hoth.
front.title: •Commander Luke Skywalker (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Once per turn, if you just deployed a Rogue Squadron pilot to same or related site, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Attrition against opponent is +1 here.
front.lore: Rogue Squadron Leader
front.title: •Commander Narra

front.gametext: Leia is defense value and forfeit +3. Your senators at battleground sites and characters at Yavin 4 locations are forfeit +2. Once per game, may take a non-[Permanent Weapon] Leia into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Leader of Rebel forces on Yavin 4. Formerly Suolriep sector HQ commander. As a Rebel spy, aided Princess Leia and Bail Organa in the years prior to the Senate's dissolution.
front.title: •Commander Vanden Willard (V)

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Anything Wedge pilots is maneuver +1. Once per turn, may take into hand One More Pass; from Reserve Deck. While piloting at a battleground site, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and [Virtual Block 4] Their Fire Has Gone Out Of The Universe flips and may not flip back.
front.lore: Promoted to commander for his heroism in the Battle of Yavin. Leader in charge of training new pilots assigned to Echo Base. Piloted Rogue 3 in the battle of Hoth.
front.title: •Commander Wedge Antilles (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. If your character or non-[Independent Starship] starship in battle is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead lost at end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0).  Rebels (except Jedi or [Permanent Weapon] characters) ignore location deploytment restrictions (and 'power -1') in their game text, apply their Endor deployment modifiers at any location, and are immune to Bad Feeling Have I.  Your Interrupts that retrieve exactly 1 Force (except Corellian Retort) are not stacked on Do They Have A Code Clearance?. Cannot be canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.title: •Commando Training & •K'lor'slug

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Ben Kenobi is deploy +1.  Your C-3PO, Lando, and Rebels (except [Death Star II] Jedi) ignore location deployment restrictions (and 'power -1') in their game text and apply their Endor deployment modifiers at any location.  Once per game, may deploy a [Virtual Block 4] Effect from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Han's Rebel strike team on the forest moon of Endor was highly trained in the use of blasters and explosives.
front.title: •Commando Training (V)

front.gametext: If your starting location has exactly 2 [Light Side Force], play instead of a starting interrupt. deploy from Reserve Deck two always [Immune to Alter] Effects; reshuffle. Deploy on table; take into hand and stack a Jedi here from Reserve Deck (that Jedi is 'communing'); reshuffle.
front.title: •Communing

front.gametext: Twice per turn, if your Lobot on Cloud City or you occupy three Cloud City sites with aliens, peek at the top three cards of your Reserve Deck. Take any of them into hand and replace the others in any order.
front.lore: Lobot's direct link with the Cloud City central computer allowed him to efficiently manipulate the floating city's resources.
front.title: Computer Interface (V)

front.gametext: Light:  Once per turn, if you occupy with a Corellian, may activate 1 Force.  Dark:  Each of your starships are hyperspeed +1 when moving from here.
front.title: •Corellia (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table if [Virtual Block 4] Watch Your Step on table.  X = number of spaceport sites controlled by Corellians.  While you control Corellia, your total battle destiny is +X, and once per turn, if you are about to lose Force (except from your card), may reduce loss by X. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Only one of the 'Big Three' starship manufacturers to sell primarily to civilians. CEC employees take great delight in calling their highly modifiable designs 'stock'.
front.title: •Corellian Engineering Corporation (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel an attempt to target your Corellian (or your starship piloted by a Corellian) with a weapon.  LOST: Retrieve your just lost Corellian (or your just lost character of ability < 4) into hand.
front.lore: 'Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us!'
front.title: •Corellian Retort (V)

front.gametext: Use 2 Force to take an Interrupt from your Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel an attempt to target your starfighter with Tallon Roll (or a weapon) Starfighter is protected from further attempts for remainder of turn. OR Cancel [Coruscant Icon] Watch Your Back! OR Exchange a card from hand for any 'spice' card you own. (Immune to Sense).
front.lore: First perfected by Corellian starship battle tacticians, this dangerous counter-maneuver has saved numerous hot-shot pilots in life-or-death situations.
front.title: Corellian Slip (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to anything she pilots. (3 if a speeder bike.) Once per turn, while piloting at a battleground site, may lose 1 Force to cancel a Force drain at opponent's interior site.
front.lore: Alderaanian slicer and technician. Trained by Brooks Carlson to serve as a Scout for Alliance commandos. She gets nervous when General Solo tries to hotwire something.
front.title: •Corporal Beezer (V)

front.gametext: Light:  If just converted, may raise this system to the top.  Dark:  If your Coruscant system was converted, Force generation +1 here.
front.title: •Coruscant (V)

front.gametext: Light:  Once per game, if Jedi Council Chamber on table, may take Speak To The Jedi Council into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Dark:  May not be separated from Jedi Council Chamber (if on table).  Force drain +1 here.
front.title: •Coruscant: Jedi Archives

front.gametext: Light:  May not be deployed if your Senate on table. If you just deployed a Jedi Council Member here, may take any one card into hand from Used Pile; reshuffle.  Dark:  If your non-battleground site on table with no related locations (or if you do not control a battleground site), [Virtual Block 5] Wipe Them Out, All Of Them is suspended.
front.title: •Coruscant: Jedi Council Chamber (V)

front.gametext: Light:  If your Insurgent present, Force Drain + 1 here.  Dark:  Characters of ability > 4 are defense value -1 here.
front.title: •Coruscant: Lower Levels

front.gametext: Light:  Attempts to 'disable' the Planetary Shield are +2 for each Rogue Squadron pilot here.  Dark:  While Center of Tyranny on table, you generate no Force here.
front.title: •Coruscant: Main Power Plant

front.gametext: Light:  Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.  Dark:  Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.
front.title: •Coruscant: Night Club

front.gametext: Light:  Starships may deploy here. Once per turn, may deploy a starship site from Reserve Deck if its starship card on table; reshuffle.  Dark:  Unless you occupy, [Virtual Block 5] Wipe Them Out, All Of Them ignores starship and holosite sites.
front.title: •Coruscant: Senate Landing Platform

front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on Leia (even if a captive) or Back Door. Attrition against opponent is +1. Once per game, may place this Effect out of play to cancel a Force drain at same or related site.
front.lore: Leia couldn't let Han out of her sight.
front.title: •Count Me In (V)

front.gametext: During battle, unless Inner Strength on table, initiate a duel between your participating Skywalker (except Shmi) present and a participating Dark Jedi present. Both players draw two destiny and add ability. Higher total wins. Loser is lost.
front.lore: Despite being alone, trapped and desperately outmatched, Luke continued his battle with the Dark Lord of the Sith.
front.title: •Courage Of A Skywalker (V)

front.gametext: USED: During opponent's move phase, if Bunker 'blown away,' peek at top four cards of a player's Reserve Deck; replace in any order.  LOST: During opponent's move phase, deploy a Rebel scout of ability < 5 from Reserve Deck to an Endor site opponent does not occupy; reshuffle.
front.lore: The stolen code allowed the Rebels to land their strike team on the Endor surface undetected - or so they thought.
front.title: •Covert Landing (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Dune Sea, Hutt Canyon, Jawa Camp, and Jawa Canyon are deserts. At deserts you occupy with a Jawa, Rontos and Sandcrawlers are power +1 and forfeit +2, and opponent's Force generation is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Mos Eisley was built around wreckage of the colony ship Dowager Queen. The wreck remains as a monument where residents leave junk for Jawa scavengers.
front.title: •Crash Site Memorial (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Heroic. Rogue Squadron Pilot. During battle when Dack (or a starship or vehicle he pilots) fires a weapon, may add 1 to total weapon destiny and hit targets are power -2. If Dack is about to leave table may place him in Used Pile instead.
front.lore: Born in an Imperial labor camp on Kalist 6. Joined the Rebellion after his escape. Young student of Commander Skywalker. Experienced crackshot gunner.
front.title: •Dack Ralter (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  While Dantooine Base Operations or More Dangerous Than You Realize on table, Dantooine sites are immune to [Premium] No Escape, and your Force generation is +1.  While you control a Dantooine site, your squadrons may deploy without replacement for X Force, where X = squadron's power -3. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The Alliance carefully chooses docking bays from which to launch limited offensives.
front.title: •Dantooine Engineering Corps

front.gametext: Light:  Your docking bay transit from here is free.  Dark:  Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force.
front.title: •Dantooine: Base - Docking Bay

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Brandon Schele - Corellia Regionals 2005)

front.gametext: Light:  Your T-47s may move as a 'react' to Dantooine sites. Immune to Revolution.  Dark:  While More Dangerous Than You Realize on table, you must control three Dantooine locations to flip it back, and Dantooine system gains one [Dark Side Force].
front.title: •Dantooine: Base - Operations Center

front.gametext: During the weapons segment, if your character is about to be lost, it is instead lost at end of battle (forfeit for 0).  OR  Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.  OR  During the power segment, cancel a just drawn destiny (except battle destiny).
front.lore: 'The Force is with you, young Skywalker. But you are not a Jedi yet.'
front.title: •Dark Approach (V)

front.gametext: USED: Take Demotion into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR For remainder of turn, cancel the game text of an Imperial (except a Dark Jedi) present with another Imperial.  LOST: Cancel Imperial Command (unless limiting your battle destiny draws).
front.lore: The huge Imperial officers corps, with its high rate of turnover, is ripe with competitiveness and ambition. Advancement comes at the expense of another's career.
front.title: Dark Dissension (V)

front.gametext: Deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  OR  If opponent just modified your battle destiny draw, cancel and redraw it (it may not be modified).  OR  If opponent just canceled your battle destiny draw, make that destiny = X instead, where X is the number of battlegrounds you occupy.
front.lore: Biggs improvised this maneuver shortly after joining the Alliance. By spinning his starfighter while firing all four cannons, he was able to destroy multiple incoming targets.
front.title: •Darklighter Spin (V)

front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. Permanent pilot is •Dash, who provides ability of 3. During battle, if with another T-47 and about to draw battle destiny, may draw two and choose one. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Enclosed.
front.title: •Dash in Rogue 10

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting alone (or at same location as opponent's AT-AT or Imperial), draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise and opponent draws no more than one battle destiny here. Dash is a matching pilot for any unique (•) Rogue speeder.
front.lore: Emperor banished Rendar family from Coruscant. Became gambler and smuggler. Brought down AT-AT at the Battle of Hoth. Works for Rebel Alliance from time to time. Corellian.
front.title: •Dash Rendar (V)

front.gametext: If in hand, may place her under Reserve Deck. May be targeted instead of Luke by Mind What You Have Learned (that card then targets Leia instead of Luke for remainder of game). May deploy Reflection from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Scout. Leader. Made friends with Wicket. Negotiated an alliance with the Ewoks. Leia found out the truth about her father from Luke in the Ewok village.
front.title: •Daughter Of Skywalker (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While with an Imperial, you may initiate battle here for free. Permanent weapon is blaster rifle (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
front.lore: Good-natured patron of Mos Eisley cantina, until the Empire impounded his starship. Expert marksman. Seeking revenge on the Empire.
front.title: •Debnoli (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Bail, Leia, and Mon Mothma are Insurgents. While an Insurgent present at a battleground, your total battle destiny is +1, and, if with your non-unique character, each may forfeit for 4 when hit. Once per game, may take one K'lor'slug into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank.
front.title: •Declaration Of Rebellion

front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on an Imperial leader of ability < 5 or a senator. That character's game text is canceled. If present with another Demotion, this Effect lost.
front.lore: Repercussions for failure are severe in the Imperial military. Many officers prefer demotion to 'alternative' punishment from Darth Vader.
front.title: Demotion (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting Rogue 4 (or any X-wing), draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Permanent weapon is Rogue Blaster (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit and it's forfeit = 0, if destiny + 1 > defense value).
front.lore: Defected from the Empire with Biggs Darklighter. Aided in mutiny aboard the transport Rand Ecliptic. Served in the Ecliptic Evaders. Luke's wingman at the Battle of Hoth.
front.title: •Derek 'Hobbie' Klivian (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. While you have less than 10 Life Force, your battle and weapon destiny draws are +1.
front.lore: Jedi training is a journey into the depths of an apprentice's subconscious, where one must learn to use the Force wisely. 'A Jedi's strength flows from the Force.'
front.title: •Descent Into The Dark (V)

front.gametext: Take Houjix or [Reflections 2] R2-D2 into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel Dark Jedi Presence, I Have You Now, or Maul Strikes. OR Place a card stacked on Droid Racks in opponent's Lost Pile. OR If a lightsaber was just 'swung' during battle, it may not target again this battle.
front.lore: If only someone had given Luke a hand.
front.title: Desperate Reach (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Clayton Atkin - California States 2009)

front.gametext: If opponent just initiated battle, lose 1 Force to target a character present.  Target is power +2 and loses all immunity to attrition this turn.  OR  Once per game, exchange a character in hand with a character of the same persona from Lost Pile or Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Members of the Rebel Alliance are willing to make a perilous frontal attack for their cause.
front.title: •Desperate Tactics(V)

front.gametext: Deploys -1 to Coruscant or to same location as Obi-Wan. Adds one battle destiny with Jango. Dring your move phase, may use X Force to "break cover" of opponent's Undercover spy at same site, where X = spy's printed deploy cost -2.
front.lore: Information broker.
front.title: •Dexter Jettster

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Skull is destiny +2.  Once per game, may deploy one Tauntaun Bones from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  You may play I Thought They Smelled Bad On The Outside as follows: 'USED: Lose 1 Force to take a creature (except Nudj), creature vehicle, or Beast-Rider into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.' (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke's defensive maneuver put him out of arm's way.
front.title: Disarming Creature (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. After starting hands are drawn, players may only take into hand or deploy on table from Reserve Deck (except as a 'react' or response) during their deploy phase (if another phase specified, it becomes 'during your deploy phase'). (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: After losing control of several extremely powerful and deadly assassin droids, the Empire issued a decree ordering their immediate destruction.
front.title: •Dismantle On Sight (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Thomas Caspersen - Norwegian Nationals 2006)

front.gametext: USED: Target one piloted starship at a system. That starship is hyperspeed -1 for remainder of turn.  LOST: If you have 2 unique (•) piloted Rebel (or [Republic]) starfighters in battle at a system, draw destiny. If destiny < 4, exclude one starship from that battle.
front.lore: Rebel pilots understand that what they lack in numbers, they must make up for in strategy. They often use diversions to remove dangerous opponents from a conflict.
front.title: •Diversionary Tactics (V)

front.gametext: Plays on table. Always Thinking With Your Stomach, Ice Storm, and Sandwhirl are canceled. Once per game, may /\ an Immediate Effect. Unless opponent occupies a battleground system, Mobilization Points is suspended.
front.lore: The Jedi won't tolerate silly behavior for very long.
front.title: •Don't Do That Again (Tatooine) (V)

front.gametext: Plays on table. Always Thinking With Your Stomach, Ice Storm, and Sandwhirl are canceled. Once per game, may /\ an Immediate Effect. Unless opponent occupies a battleground system, Mobilization Points is suspended.
front.lore: The Jedi won't tolerate silly behavior for very long.
front.title: •Don't Do That Again (V)

front.gametext: USED: Cancel an attempt to target a droid with a weapon.  LOST: If a battle was just initiated at a site, lose 1 Force and place your droid there out of play to cancel all opponent's weapon and battle destiny draws during this battle.
front.lore: 'We're on our way!'
front.title: •Don't Forget The Droids (V)

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Steven Lewis - PC Volunteer Award 2008)

front.gametext: USED: Use 1 Force to deploy an Effect that deploys for free on table (or on your side of table) and is always Immune to Alter from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  STARTING: When drawing your starting hand, draw up to 12 cards instead of 8. Place this Interrupt in Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Han did not take kindly to Jabba's posturing.
front.title: Don't Tread On Me (V)

front.gametext: USED: Initiate a battle for free.  STARTING: If Dantooine Operations on table, deploy from Reserve Deck Operations Center, Dantooine Engineering Corps, and up to two Effects which deploy on table (or your side of table), are always [Immune to Alter], and have no deploy cost. Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: 'Stand-by alert. Death Star approaching. Estimated time to firing range, fifteen minutes.'
front.title: Don't Underestimate Our Chances (V)

front.gametext: Once per turn, if Amidala at another location, may activate 1 Force. During your move phase, may target an opponent's Undercover spy here and draw two destiny. Choose one (take the other into hand). If destiny +1 > target's ability, 'break cover' of target.
front.lore: Spy and handmaiden.
front.title: •Dorme'

front.gametext: Deploy on table. All immunity to attrition is -3. You may not fire [Permanent Weapon] weapons. If opponent just lost a Dark Jedi or a battle, they lose 1 Force. During your draw phase, use 3 Force or place this Effect in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: News of Imperial defeat inspires the citizens of the galaxy. A major loss seriously undermines the Empire's ability to function.
front.title: •Down With The Emperor! (V)

front.gametext: Light:  During your control phase, if you occupy, may lose 1 Force to retrieve a trooper into hand.  Dark:  Force drain -1 here.  Despair may not prevent cards from moving as a 'react' (except away from battle).
front.title: •Dressel

front.gametext: Deploy on your T-47. May target a character or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Character hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +2 > defense value. Vehicle hit if destiny +X > defense value, where X = T-47 pilot's ability (maximum 5).
front.lore: Sund x2-100 laser cannon. Popular among outlaw organizations because it is both cheap and powerful. Frequently mounted on T-47 airspeeders.
front.title: Dual Laser Cannon (V)

front.gametext: While at a non-shielded marker site, may use 1 Force to suspend 'Hoth Energy Shield Rules' until the start of your next turn.
front.lore: Like many Rebel specialists, Trey Callum defected from the Imperial officer corps. Trooper officers are masters at stretching the meager resources of the Rebellion.
front.title: •••Echo Base Trooper Officer (V)

front.gametext: USED: Reveal the top four cards of your Reserve Deck and separate them into two piles of any size. Opponent places one pile in your hand and the other on top of your Used Pile in any order. OR Take Control into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. LOST: Place an opponent's just-played Interrupt out of play.
front.lore: 'Deal!'
front.title: •Either Way, You Win (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on opponent's just deployed [Reflections 3][Maintenance] card; opponent loses 1 Force, you may retrieve 1 Force, and you may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.  Target is power -3 and opponent must use 1 Force to apply target's ability towards drawing battle destiny.  During opponent's draw phase, opponent must lose 1 Force or place target in Lost Pile.  If just lost, place this Effect in Used Pile. (Immune to Control.)  OR  If you are about to lose Force during opponent's control phase, deploy on table to reduce loss by 2.
front.title: Eject! Eject! (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on a Jedi. May add 1 to Force drain at opponent's site where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. If total destiny > defense value, target hit and may not be used to satisfy attrition.
front.lore: The lightsaber is an extremely versatile weapon, making a Jedi a rather difficult opponent to slow down. 'This is impossible!'
front.title: Elegant Lightsaber

front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Your ••• aliens are deploy -1.  Your Rep is immune to attrition and may not be captured.  While you have alien characters of five different species on table, your Force drains and battle destiny draws are +1, and opponent's battle destiny draws are -1. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Like many Duros, Madak has natural piloting and navigation skill. Former scout. Freelance instructor. Makes runs to important trade worlds Celanon, Byblos and Yaga Minor.
front.title: Ellorrs Madak (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on your non-droid spy at Back Door.  Target your war room.  Until completed, spy may not relocate or be Undercover.  When Utinni Effect reaches target, stack there: opponent's battle destiny draws are -1 and your spies may not have their forfeit reduced below 3.
front.lore: Hologram technology allows effecient communication of complex intelligence during war room briefings.
front.title: •Emperor's Sinister Plans

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Brian Hollingworth - NYC Mini-Open Winner 2005)

front.gametext: Deploy on a non-docking bay exterior planet site you occupy. While you occupy this site, at same and related sites, your characters may deploy regardless of location deployment restrictions. Once per game, your character may deploy -3 here. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Pirates, smugglers and Rebels operate from tiny camps which can be set up quickly and relocated at a moment's notice. A surprise visitor made Luke an unhappy camper.
front.title: <>Encampment (V)

front.gametext: Cancel an Effect with 'occupation' in title. (Immune to Sense.) OR During your draw phase, if you have a Rebel scout alone at Back Door, draw destiny. Activate or retrieve 5 Force and place this Interrupt on bottom of Lost Pile if destiny < the number of your scouts on table.
front.lore: The Rebel presence on Endor meant that the Ewoks would be able to live free from the Empire's tyranny.
front.title: •Endor Celebration (V)

front.gametext: Light:  Non-unique Ewoks are Heroic. While you occupy, gains one [Light Side Force]. No starships or vehicles here.  Dark:  No starships or vehicles here. If no Ewoks on Endor, Force drain +1 here.
front.title: •Endor: Ewok Village (V)

front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your starfighter. May target a starship for free. Draw destiny. If on a Heroic starfighter, may use 1 Force to add 3 to total. Target hit if destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Often modified by Rebel technicians. Heavy warhead provides increased armor penetration. Decreased maneuverability and effectiveness against starfighters.
front.title: Enhanced Proton Torpedoes (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on a site. During battle here, you take the first weapons segment action. Your characters are defense value +1 here.
front.lore: As the Empire advances, Rebels retreat to fortified positions to marshal their resources and redeploy the troops.
front.title: •Entrenchment (V)

front.gametext: May add 6 pilots. Permanent pilot provides ability of 3. Unless your [Reflections 2] objective on table, once per game, may deploy a non-[Maintenance] scoundrel aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle and while Corran or a Terrik piloting, immune to attrition < 7.
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •Errant Venture

front.gametext: May add 6 pilots. Permanent pilot provides ability of 3. Unless your [Reflections 2] objective on table, once per game, may deploy a non-[Maintenance] scoundrel aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle and while Corran or a Terrik piloting, immune to attrition < 7.
front.lore: Blank
front.title: •Errant Venture (AI)

front.gametext: Take a dejarik, hologram, or holosite into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel a Force drain at a holosite. OR If opponent is about to place your character out of play, place that character in your Lost Pile instead.
front.lore: Capital starships have emergency escape pods. Equipped with food, water, flares, medpacs, hunting blaster and tracking beacon (R2-D2 deactivated this one's beacon).
front.title: Escape Pod (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table; shuffle your Reserve Deck, peek at top three cards, and stack them face-up here. During battle, may take a card here into hand to prevent all battle destiny draws from being modified or canceled (each player may draw no more than one battle destiny). (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Give the evacuation code signal...and get to your transports!'
front.title: Evacuation Control (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on a holosite.  [Virtual Block] Wipe Them Out, All Of Them ignores this site.  'Effect' on Alter may be treated as 'Mantellian Savrip.'  The game text of your Effects here may not be suspended.  Except during battles here, may play your Interrupts here as if from hand.
front.lore: 'I don't like the look of this.'
front.title: •Eyes In The Dark (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your unique (•) [Hoth], [Endor], and [Death Star II] non-pilot warriors of destiny > 1 are troopers. Your troopers have armor = 4. When opponent is about to remove their last card from Life Force, you may first place all your troopers in Used Pile (last card must still be removed). (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Unlike the Empire, the Alliance treats their droids with respect. Many droids volunteered to share the risk of battle and aid the Rebellion's assault on the Death Star.
front.title: •Faithful Service (V)

front.gametext: If you just forfeited a character of ability < 5 present at a site, deploy on that character (who remains at same site and, if 'hit,' is restored to normal).  Character is forfeit = 0 (even if forfeit may not normally be reduced).  May play First Aid to place this card in Used Pile.  Immune to your Control.
front.lore: The Alliance lost many fine soldiers at conflicts such as the Battle of Hoth. The Rebel High Command is aware of the cost of freedom from Imperial tyranny.
front.title: ••Field Dressing

front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated (except at a Coruscant site), each of your troopers and [Republic] starfighters present is power +1 and immune to attrition for remainder of turn.
front.lore: Lieutenant Page effectively deployed his detachment of Rebel commandos during the attack at the control bunker.
front.title: Firefight (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -1 to same site as Camie. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to place a card from Crash Site Memorial in Used Pile. If Crash Site Memorial leaves table (except by your card), place all cards on it in Used Pile.
front.lore: Careful manipulator of funds and Imperial taxation codes. Buys droids from Jawas and sells them to the Alliance.
front.title: •Fixer

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Play with the top card of your Reserve Deck revealed (if possible). During your draw phase, place this Effect in Used Pile and you may retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Occasionally Han was capable of such feats, even without Threepio there to tell him these things.
front.title: •Flash Of Insight (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once during your control phase, if opponent occupies a non-battleground location, may peek at top two cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Before swinging across the treacherous abyss, Leia gave Luke a kiss for luck. Despite an incessant storm of laserblasts, they made it.
front.title: •For Luck (V)

front.gametext: If at your prison, light side goes first. Deploys -2 to Coruscant or a mobile site. May carry a character of power < 4 (as if riding a creature vehicle). Guardian's Lightsaber may deploy on Foul. Once per game, may take a clone or a non-Jedi alien into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Talz.
front.title: •Foul Moudama

front.gametext: During a battle at opponent's site (or your non-<> site), instead of firing one of your character weapons at a target, cause that target to be immunity to attrition -3 (or limited to immunity to attrition < 5) for remainder of turn. OR Find one of your missing characters. OR Cancel a 'react.' OR Once per game, use 1 Force to exchange a card in hand with the top most character of ability < 5 in your Lost Pile.
front.lore: Blank.
front.title: •Found Someone You Have & Higher Ground

front.gametext: Find one of your missing characters. OR Retrieve the topmost character of your Lost Pile into hand.
front.lore: 'I'm looking for someone.' 'Looking? Found someone you have I would say.'
front.title: Found Someone You Have (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on the Hoth system if you control two exterior Hoth sites. During your control phase, may retrieve 1 Force for each Hoth site you control with a unique (•) combat vehicle. If opponent controls this system, this Effect lost. While you occupy 1st marker, immune to Alter.
front.lore: 'Then I'll see you in hell!'
front.title: •Frostbite (V)

front.gametext: Deploy on a docking bay or your capital starship. Your unique (•) starships are power, maneuver, and hyperspeed +1. May place this device in Lost Pile to cancel Lateral Damage. If opponent controls this location, place this device in Used Pile.
front.lore: Uses standard fusion technology. Provides starships with energy for hyperspace travel. Installed at docking bays and throughout the Outer Rim Territories.
front.title: Fusion Generator Supply Tanks (V)

front.gametext: During opponent's control phase, if your gambler on table, use 1 Force. Both players draw three destiny. Winner (higher total destiny) may target one opponent's character with a printed power matching one of the winner's destiny draws. Target is lost.
front.lore: Works every time.
front.title: •Gambler's Luck (V)

front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Opponent may not add destiny draws to power or attrition here. While all your ability here is provided by scouts and/or spies, adds one battle destiny and once during your turn may peek at top card of opponent's Force Pile.
front.lore: Leader, scout, and information broker.
front.title: •General Airen Cracken

front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting a non-[Episode I] corvette or a stolen starship, adds one battle destiny and it is immune to attrition < 5. 'Exiled' (placed out of play) if at Corellia. Once per game, may steal a dreadnaught from opponent's Lost Pile into hand.
front.lore: Insurgent leader. Corellian.
front.title: •General Bel Iblis

front.gametext: While at an interior Yavin 4 site, Massassi Base Sentry is [Immune to Alter], and, once per turn, during battle at a 'liberated' system (either opponent's or one with only one [Dark Side]), except Yavin 4, may place your just forfeited card in Used Pile.
front.lore: Typical of hard-line Corellian officers known for caution in battle. Leader of resistance in Bothan space. Developed strong ties to Bothan spynet.
front.title: •General Bob Hudsol
